channel.title: Tag: moravec - blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Moravec’s Cats
item.description: <html><head></head><body>Every ship-morning, I woke up covered in a half-dozen cats. Sometime in the ship-night, theyâ€™d wander in from the ducts and find spots to curl up around my sleeping body, virtually pinning me under the sheet and all purring from speaker grilles when I stirred.</body></html>
